title: Langevin Function
description:
LANGEVIN Function is very similarto sigmoid function, but more
slowly approaching the limits. In contrast to the sigmoid are the values at
-1 and +1. The Langevin function is mainly at CPUs without foating point
unit much faster than the Sigmoid function.
The following chart shows the progress of the Langevin function:
name: LANGEVIN

input.name: X
input.description: Input parameter representing a real number.

output.name: LANGEVIN
output.description: The calculated Langevin value based on the input parameter X.

return_value.description: Returns the Langevin value, which is a real number calculated based on the input X.
